data:
CREATE TABLE `mysql_all`(`tinyint1` tinyint, `smallint1` smallint, `mediumint1` int, `int1` int, `interger1` int, `bigint1` bigint, `bit1` tinyint, `real1` double, `double1` double, `float1` float, `decimal1` decimal(10,0), `numeric1` decimal(10,0), `char1` string, `varchar1` string, `date1` date, `time1` string, `year1` int, `timestamp1` string, `datetime1` string, `smalldatetime1` string, `text1` string)
PARTITIONED BY (`pt` string)
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcSerde'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES (
  'serialization.format' = '1'
)
STORED AS
  INPUTFORMAT 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcInputFormat'
  OUTPUTFORMAT 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcOutputFormat'
TBLPROPERTIES (
  'transient_lastDdlTime' = '1534311277'
) lifecycle 9999 ;
